name: DV_ENCAPSULATED
title: DV_ENCAPSULATED
description: Abstract class defining the common meta-data of all types of encapsulated data.

element.short: Abstract class defining the common meta-data of all types of encapsulated data.
element.definition: Abstract class defining the common meta-data of all types of encapsulated data.

constraint.human: Size valid must satisfy range constraints

element.short: Name of character encoding scheme in which this value is encoded.
element.definition: Name of character encoding scheme in which this value is encoded. Coded from openEHR Code Set  character sets . Unicode is the default assumption in openEHR, with UTF-8 being the assumed encoding. This attribute allows for variations from these assumptions.

element.short: Optional indicator of the localised language in which the data is written, if relevant.
element.definition: Optional indicator of the localised language in which the data is written, if relevant. Coded from openEHR Code Set `languages`.
